```{r}

library(tidyverse)

set.seed(88)

```


```{r}

mnorm1 <- MASS::mvrnorm(n = 30, mu = c(1, 5), Sigma = matrix(c(1,0, 0, 1), 2, 2))
mnorm2 <- MASS::mvrnorm(n = 30, mu = c(7, 5), Sigma = matrix(c(1,0, 0, 1), 2, 2))

data1 = rbind(mnorm1, mnorm2)

plot(data1, col = c(rep(1,30), rep(2, 30)))

# write_csv(data1 %>% as_tibble() %>% rename(x = 1, y = 2), "kmeans_ex1.csv")


```


```{r}

mnorm1 <- MASS::mvrnorm(n = 100, mu = c(1,1), Sigma = matrix(c(1,0.2, 0.2, 1), 2, 2))
mnorm2 <- MASS::mvrnorm(n = 100, mu = c(5,5), Sigma = matrix(c(1,0.2, 0.2, 1), 2, 2))
mnorm3 <- MASS::mvrnorm(n = 100, mu = c(6,2), Sigma = matrix(c(1.2,0.2, 0.2, 1.2), 2, 2))

data2 = rbind(mnorm1, mnorm2, mnorm3)

plot(data2, col = c(rep(1,100), rep(2, 100), rep(3, 100)))

# write_csv(data2 %>% as_tibble() %>% select(x = 1, y = 2), "kmeans_ex2.csv")

```
